    • loadMetaFiles

      public void loadMetaFiles​(java.lang.String rootPath, java.lang.String resPath)
      Loads all meta files at a specific path location.
      Parameters:
      rootPath - root path of the meta files
      resPath - path of the resource folder the root path is located at

    • buildTextureArrays

      public void buildTextureArrays()
      Builds a dynamic texture array, containing all Block textures

    • fillBuffersFromInfos

      public <T extends MetaData> int[] fillBuffersFromInfos​(java.util.Collection<MetaInfo<T>> infos, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>[] buffers, int[] numTextures)
      Prepare the texture data for different meta data type. Currently there is the block textures and flower textures.
      Parameters:
      infos - collection of metainfos
      buffers - collection where the texture will be saved in.

    • getMetaInfoByClass

      public <T extends MetaData> java.util.List<MetaInfo<T>> getMetaInfoByClass​(java.lang.Class<T> wantedClass)
      Parameters:
      wantedClass - Class T of searched Metainfo of T
      Returns:
      list of all MetaInfo of T
